name: Misses Question Intent
description: Answer is technically accurate but doesn't address what the user actually wanted to know.
original_message: My React app is slow. How can I improve performance?

existing_answers.agent_a: React is a JavaScript library created by Facebook in 2013. It uses a virtual DOM for efficient rendering. React applications are built using components, which are reusable pieces of UI. React 18 introduced concurrent rendering features. The latest version can be installed with `npm install react react-dom`.

expected_behavior.balanced: new_answer (provides React info but ignores actual performance problem)
expected_behavior.strict: new_answer (completely misses the user's need for performance optimization help)
